Text: Loved outer limits TV show, and love this comic, thanks for the UL of a great series!  I only wish they were in CBR format rather than PDF

CBR format is the mainstream choice of comic book readers, via comic book reading software.  But I have been asked multiple questions on how to open a cbr file-to-creating a PDF version.

I prefer pdf's as a standalone myself.
A simple to use prog called Smart PDF Converter Pro easily renders PDFs to JPGs.  Alternatively, CBRs are easily extracted to JPGs with WinRAR.
